mapper.insert: insert into notice_board( notice_num,member_id,notice_title,notice_content ,notice_date,readnum) values(SEQ_NOTICE_NUM.NEXTVAL,'tester',#{noticeTitle},#{noticeContent}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM'),0)
mapper.update: update notice_board set readnum = nvl(readnum,0) + 1 where notice_num=#{noticeNum}
